summary: App with admin access via a shared passkey on the admin page; Version 25 has an access regression blocking enquiries/messages and needs restoration of full admin rights when the correct passkey is entered.
architectural_notes: Admin access is granted via a single shared passkey entered on the existing admin page; correct passkey unlocks full admin rights across the app.
Admin passkey is hard-coded to "vEDANSH468" (no in-app change mechanism).
known_issues: Version 25 shows "you don't have access to see enquiries and messages" even for intended admin users (regression in admin access control).

existing_features.title: When a user enters the correct admin passkey on the existing admin login page, unlock full admin access across the app (including enquiries and messages) for that user session.

Fix the regression causing "Unauthorized"/"no access" errors for admin-only backend methods by ensuring the passkey verification flow also authenticates the caller with the backendâ€™s admin authorization mechanism.

new_feature_requests.summary: Restore full admin access (including enquiries/messages) for all users who enter the correct admin passkey on the admin page; passkey is hard-coded to vEDANSH468.
Keep the admin passkey hard-coded as "vEDANSH468" and do not add any UI or settings to change it.

projectName: Restore admin access for enquiries and messages using shared passkey (vEDANSH468)
